title: elemental  yasuo as a skin
body: Rito if you can make a yasuo skin which can represent some elements like q can be lighting and w can be rock that explodes like a tower  and  for e water passive can be lighting rock then water and the ult  is all elements in one big tornado.Rito if you can do this it would be epic or keep it as an idea  please as a community say yes or no.

replies.body: They stole your idea and gave it to Lux, boooo!

> [{quoted}](name=crazyhead,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IkAfEF3E,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-18T04:56:22.697+0000)
>
> Rito if you can make a yasuo skin which can represent some elements like q can be lighting and w can be rock that explodes like a tower  and  for e water passive can be lighting rock then water and the ult  is all elements in one big tornado.Rito if you can do this it would be epic or keep it as an idea  please as a community say yes or no.

yo dude this should be a skin yes but does riot have the time?
\
MM not really a great idea. Too much rrandomness. He is a swordsman with air.. Nami has a massive wave as an ult. It'd all get too confusing imo but who knows. Don't be discouraged
they can do it they did spirit guard udyr  plus doesn't need to be massive just needs to look pretty and nami with water what about pool party rek'sai
